Articles.Content:
I found this game via the Star Citizen forum and I'm hooked! So far Jeb has visited Minmus, Mun and Ike. An unfortunate miscalculation made him end up in an orbit just inside of Duna - but after 25 years resources are finally reserved for a rescue mission. Bill also did visit Ike and has now done a successful docking with the tank/engine supposed to take him home again. He is waiting for a launch window.

I have also built a low flying probe that visited Ike in preparation for the manned mission. The ion engine powered probe did some spectacular low flying:

An attempt to clear a ridgeline failed due to... solar eclipse:

Next on the to-do-list is to find an add-on that improves the navigation node tuning and something that helps calculate dV.
Welcome aboard! Congratulations on getting to the Mun, Minmus, and Ike!
Welcome to the KSP forum! That's quite the cute little probe you've got there. Very stylish.
Had. I had it. It's gone now...
